introduction: Full Stack Developer with +3 years of experience, mostly stack MERN. about: I'm Computer Engineer, familiar with wide range of programming utilities and languages. I really enjoy creating awesome software, don't hesitate to contact to me if you have an amazing idea or startup and you want a partner.
